# jpfun

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The package jpfun is a collection of utility functions.

## Installation

You can install the development version of jpfun from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jcpernias/jpfun")
```
